statements: UPDATE bicycle_warranty_information SET warranty_period = 24, warranty_terms = 'Extended warranty' WHERE warranty_id = 1;
UPDATE bicycle_warranty_information SET registration_details = '{"owner": "John Doe", "purchase_date": "2022-01-15"}' WHERE warranty_id = 2;

UPDATE bicycle_warranty_information SET warranty_period = 24, warranty_terms = 'Limited Lifetime Warranty', registration_details = '{"customer_name": "John Doe", "email": "john.doe@example.com"}' WHERE warranty_id = 1;

UPDATE bicycle_warranty_information SET warranty_terms = '1 Year Limited Warranty', warranty_period = 12, registration_details = '{"customer_name": "Jane Smith", "email": "jane.smith@example.com"}' WHERE warranty_id = 2;
UPDATE warranty_info SET warranty_period = 12 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE registration_details SET customer_name = 'John Doe', address = '123 Main St' WHERE registration_id = 1001;
UPDATE warranty_info SET warranty_period = 12, registration_date = '2023-01-01' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE registration_details SET address = '42 Main Street', phone_number = '123-456-7890', bicycle_model = 'Mountain Bike' WHERE registration_id = 101;
UPDATE warranty_information SET warranty_terms = 'Extended Warranty Terms' WHERE warranty_id = 1;
UPDATE bicycle_information SET manufacturer_name = 'New Manufacturer' WHERE bicycle_id = 3;
UPDATE warranty_information SET warranty_period='1 year', warranty_terms='Limited Warranty', registration_details='www.example.com' WHERE warranty_id=1;
UPDATE bicycle_information SET manufacturer_name='New Manufacturer', bicycle_model='Updated Model' WHERE bicycle_id=2;
UPDATE warranty_periods SET terms = 'Extended warranty' WHERE warranty_id = 1;
UPDATE warranty_registration SET customer_name = 'John Doe', customer_email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE registration_id = 3;
UPDATE warranty_registration SET customer_name='John Doe', customer_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE registration_id=12345;
UPDATE warranty_details SET term_id=10, registration_id=54321 WHERE warranty_id=100;

UPDATE warranty_bicycle SET warranty_term_id = 2, registration_id = 5 WHERE bicycle_id = 3;
UPDATE warranty_periods SET duration = 12 WHERE warranty_name = 'Standard Warranty';
UPDATE warranty_terms SET term_description = 'Extended warranty coverage for critical components' WHERE term_id = 2;
